title: jnAna paNDitA
sahitya:
jnAna paNDitA shakti vaDivEl vAngu


anupallavi

  mOn paNDitargaL muzhugum inbak-kaDalE gAna paNDitargaL kanivil Urum tEnE


caraNam    pAvi nAn paDum tuyaram pArppadunakk-azhagO Avi shOrvaDaindu alaiginraden uLLam 
muruga kumara-venroru murai manam tannilE uruga ninravargaL uNarvinil tOnriDum uyar
